-README.txt      This file
-Torrent.idl     idl file for project
-Torrent.mpc     project creater file
-Torrent.mwc     workspace creater file
-torrent.cbp     CodeBlocks project file (can ignore completely)
-torrent.layout  CodeBlocks project layout file (can ignore completely)

# Generated by $ACE_ROOT/bin/tao_idl -IG Torrent.idl
-TorrentI.cpp/.h

# Generated by $ACE_ROOT/bin/tao_idl Torrent.idl
-TorrentS.cpp/.h
-TorrentC.cpp/.h 
-TorrentC.inl

# Peer related source
Peer.cpp/.h               code to launch appropriate threads
peer_client_role.cpp      code for server thread of peer
peer_server_role.cpp      code for client thread of peer

# Tracker related source
Tracker.cpp/.h            code to launch the server thread
tracker_server_role.cpp   code for server thread of tracker

# made projects for GNUMAKE with $ACE_ROOT/bin/mpc.pl Torrent.mpc
GNUmakefile.Torrent_Idl       auto generated make file
GNUmakefile.Torrent_Peer      auto generated make file
GNUmakefile.Torrent_Tracker   auto generated make file

# made workspace for GNUMAKE with $ACE_ROOT/bin/mwc.pl Torrent.mwc
GNUMakefile                   auto generated make file, for entire project
